roleset.name: cause to turn away
roleset.note: DIVERT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'divert' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison. (from divert.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: agent, but no source
example.text: Company lawyers recently sent letters to growers saying that Michael-1 ``would take very seriously any effort ... *trace*-1 to divert its contracted-for potatoes to other outlets.''

example.name: no agent, source and destination
example.text: With the increase, [even more developing-country energy and talent]-1 would be diverted *trace*-1 from creating profitable economic systems to setting up economic planning ministries that generate IMF-approved economic plans.
example.arg: to setting up economic planning ministries that generate IMF-approved economic plans

example.name: The ileostomy causes the diversion and it is done by forming a loop in the illium to reconnect it in the stoma
without causer
example.text: Is diversion of funds really embezzlement?

example.name: args 1-3
example.text: the mere diversion of funds from other parts of the economy and from other forms of housing -LRB- such as low - income -RRB- to the single - family home market would result in a major expense .
example.arg: from other parts of the economy and from other forms of housing -LRB- such as low - income -RRB
to the single - family home market
